title: I’m in Marvel, My Wife Is Scarlet Witch - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi
tags: Fanfiction   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist
author: 我不是微笑
description:
Li Bufan crossed into the Marvel Universe and accidentally saved the Scarlet Witch. After three years of interaction, the Scarlet Witch finally became his wife, and they lived peacefully and happily.

Then, a group of uninvited guests arrived and shattered this peace.

Magneto, Professor-X, Avengers, Abomination, Venom, Loki, Ronan the Accuser, Lord of Dark Dimension Dormammu ...... and even the big purple-faced potato!

What could Li Bufan do?

To protect and maintain his happy life with his wife, he could only rely on the real-world extraction system to extract skills from the other worlds.

Extracting, Extracting ......

Magneto: 'You are the future of mutants!'

Lord of Dark Dimension Dormammu: 'Many people say I am a demon. My friend, believe me, this is definitely your illusion. There is someone even more ruthless than me on Earth.'

Thanos: “Don’t fight! What you say is indeed correct. Can't I just accept it? '

…...>
